TopicTitle: Anyone Here Ever played EV NOVA by Ambrosia?

Articles.Content: Just curious because i think that some of the SpaceCraft Featuring in the game could inspire some of our Add-on Developers

I played EV, EV Overdrive, and EV Nova -- the first more extensively than the other two, but I greatly enjoyed all the games.

Now that we have ASAS and with thrust vectoring coming up, I think we\'re coming into an era of KSP where hilariously unstable, terrible rocket designs might be able to claw their way to space. By 'terrible' I mean 'things with wings at the top.' Also, with thrust vectoring more agile craft are possible, and it becomes possible to make spacecraft which actually have some turning capability when under thrust. So I can see the space fighter concept taking off a bit more.

Unfortunately, I fail at modeling. But I offer moral support to this!
